message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time. I think you'll find it's a steal at $200. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $150 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $200 is my bottom line. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere for a product of this quality.
I've reconsidered and decided to make a final offer. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
